thread.title: Former State Rep. Sandra Peterson dies
thread.title_full: Former State Rep. Sandra Peterson dies

title: Former State Rep. Sandra Peterson dies
text:
Oct 24, 2015 
Former State Rep. Sandra Peterson has died. 
Peterson is a former teacher who was first elected to the House of Representatives in 2004. She announced her retirement from the Legislature in 2012 citing health concerns. â€¢ May 2012: Peterson is the latest MN House member to announce retirement 
"The Minnesota DFL family is devastated to have lost Sandra Peterson," DFL chairman Ken Martin said in a statement today. 
In addition to serving in the Minnesota House of Representatives, Peterson also served as president of the Minnesota Federation of Teachers.
